Permit Dossier Guide

What goes into a permit dossier that teams can act on.

A dossier is only useful if it shortens decision time. Keep it focused on timeline, status, scope, and risk signals tied to the actual address.

Last updated: 2026-02-18

Get Permit Dossier ($499) Call/Text

Core sections

  • Permit timeline with date-stamped milestones and status snapshot.
  • Approved scope summary with clear exclusions and assumptions.
  • Open-item and correction risk notes that can delay next action.
  • Source appendix so someone else can verify every key claim.

When to run one

  • Before pricing a job with unclear permit history.
  • Before escrow close where open items can change negotiations.
  • When a project has long permit cycles and status uncertainty.

Related resources

Start with service details, then review a sample package:

  • Permit Due Diligence Dossier (LA)
  • Sample dossier
